Deprecated API

Contents

  • Terminally Deprecated
  • Enum Classes
  • Methods
  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    dev.morphia.config.MorphiaConfig.codecProvider()
    this configuration entry will be updated to use SPI as with other customizations
    dev.morphia.mapping.Mapper.addInterceptor(EntityListener<?>)
    use EntityListeners to define any lifecycle event listeners
    dev.morphia.mapping.Mapper.map(Class...)
    This is handled via the config file and should not be called manually
    dev.morphia.mapping.Mapper.map(String)
    This is handled via the config file and should not be called manually
    dev.morphia.mapping.Mapper.map(List<Class<?>>)
    This is handled via the config file and should not be called manually
    dev.morphia.mapping.Mapper.mapPackage(String)
    This is handled via the config file and should not be called manually
    dev.morphia.mapping.Mapper.mapPackageFromClass(Class)
    This is handled via the config file and should not be called manually
    dev.morphia.mapping.PropertyDiscovery
    3.0 will evaluate both field and getter/setters for annotation so this setting becomes vestigial

    Description

    use Aggregation.addFields(AddFields)
